name: 蔡佳玟
objective:
本課程為產品設計專案程序之理論與實務
設計與創造性思考，專案與程序，劇本法邏輯，目標澄清，設計研究與調查，構想展開與評估，細部改善，語意法，專案設計策略。
This course focuses on concept and methods on product design project. It includes: Design Logic, Scenario Planning, Expression, Legibility, Semantics, Problem Solving, Concept Generation Evolution, Technology and Market.
schedule:
Week. 1	Introduction，Team Building
Week. 2	Design thinking and method
Week. 3	Observation + AEIOU
Week. 4	Mind Mapping
Week. 5	AEIOU + Mind Mapping Practical activity exercise
Week. 6	Discover with Empathy Map
Week. 7	Stakeholder
Week. 8	Empathy Map + Stakeholder Practical activity exercise
Week. 9	Midterm
Week. 10 Persona
Week. 11 User Journey Map
Week. 12 Value map/ Before After table
Week. 13 Brainstorming for Ideation
Week. 14 Design refinement
Week. 15 Functional prototype model and User Testing
Week. 16 Refined Functional Model
Week. 17 User Scenario-Based Design
Week. 18 Final Presentation

The course schedule will be adjusted accordingly based on the learning progress.
scorePolicy:
Course assignment, Class Participation, and Attendance: 30%
Mid-term Presentation: 30%
Final Presentation: 40%
consultation: You can consult with the classroom and course group, or arrange another appointment with the instructor for consultation.
